author: knash
body:
#### PR description:

Pull request to incorporate hadron flavour identification with Herwig7.
This is just a merge of the two PRs from @raggleton and Radek Zlebcik

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/8866ad2aa366cd3ba4aa1086d434ae21b6e1b7a8
and
https://github.com/raggleton/cmssw/commit/b4a6384fcaf66e3ec20b34c9ce75f60353443658
title: Herwig7 hadron flavour identification
